name: Dooake
short_description:
A playable FPS Multiplayer shooter.
Supports both OpenGL and DirectX 9

I have coded this project for about 2 years intensively when the Doom3 Alpha leaked.
Since then i returned to coding it on several occasions, adding more features like:
Networking - Late client join
Graphics - Q3A shader to CG Shader convertor :)
and many other features.

The current project status is that, while playable , there are still many things that need improvement.
From better objects art and effects, to ragdoll death.
summary: Dooake - Multiplayer FPS - Play Doom3 monsters on Q3A Levels!
